europeana:record.dc:title: Apanteles (Choeras) gielisi spec. nov. (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Microgastrinae) from The Netherlands and the first report of Trichoptera as host of Braconidae
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera
Braconidae
Microgastrinae
Apanteles gielisi

new species

Limnophilidae
Trichoptera

europeana:record.dc:description: A new species of the genus Apanteles Foerster, 1862 (subgenus Choeras Mason, 1981) from The Netherlands is described and illustrated. The new species is reported to be a parasitoid of larvae of terrestrial Trichoptera (Limnophilidae), which is the first report of this order as host of Braconidae. A key to the European species of the subgenus Choeras Mason is added.
